name: Ion_Field
display_help: You are taking some energy damage just being near the Elemental!

name: Ion_Blast
display_help: Sends a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Ion Blast deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.

name: Ion_Discharge
display_help: You have been Disoriented by an Ion Discharge.

name: Ionic_Embrace
display_help: The Elemental has Held you and temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery with it's Ionic Embrace!

name: Ion_Burst
display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ion Burst deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.

name: Ion_Strike
display_help: You have been Disoriented by an Ion Strike.

name: Resistance
display_help: Archvillain resistance.

name: SummonFX
display_help: This power is simply the visual fx for when Faathim is released.

name: Fly
display_help: Faathim can Fly!

name: Heal_Other
display_help: Heals a single targeted ally. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

name: Healing_Aura
display_help: Healing Aura restores some Hit Points to you and all nearby heroes. Healing Aura is not as potent as Heal Other, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate

name: Fortitude
display_help: Fortitude immensely enhances a single ally's Accuracy, damage, and Defense. The target takes less damage from successful attacks. Fortitude also protects the targeted hero from Psionic attacks and damage. Recharge: Long

name: Siphon_Power
display_help: Your power has been drained! You are doing less damage than before.

name: Fulcrum_Shift
display_help: Your power has been drained! You are doing less damage than before.

name: Dispersion_Bubble
display_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increase defense to all attacks except psionic. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies inside from Immobilization, Disorient and Hold effects.

name: Protection_Shield
display_help: The Protection Shield protects others from smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy and negative energy attacks for a limited time. The magnetic nature of the shield makes attacks less likely to land and affect your ally. Multiple Shields can be stacked on one target to improve the defense.
display_short_help: Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative)

name: Imprisonment
display_help: Faathim's prison must be destroyed so he may be released.

name: Release
display_help: When Faathim's prison is about to be destroyed, Faathim is released.

name: Fury
display_help: The Fury Monument has increased your Damage potential, but reduced your Recovery Rate.

name: Hatred
display_help: The Hatred Monument has increased your Recovery Rate, but reduced your Damage potential.

name: Thunder_Clap
display_help: Lanaru has Disoriented you with his Thunder Clap.

name: Hurricane
display_help: The wind and rain from Lanaru's Hurricane have reduced your range and accuracy.

name: Lightning_Storm
display_help: Lanaru can summon a massive Lightning Storm overhead that will strike any foe that approaches the Witch Doctor. Lightning Bolts from this storm can knock down and damage all foes near the strike, and can cause panic. Lightning Bolts will continue to strike for the lifetime of the storm.

name: Summon_Elemental
display_help: The Witch Doctor can summon a Husk to fight at his side.

name: Snow_Storm
display_help: Lanaru has reduced your attack and movement speed with his Snow Storm.

name: Ice_Storm
display_help: The Ice Storm is reducing your movement and attack speeds. You are also taking cold damage over time.

name: Blizzard
display_help: The Blizzard is freezing you. Your Accuracy, movement speed and attack speed are reduced. You are taking damage over time.

name: Freezing_Rain
display_help: The Freezing Rain is chilling you, reducing your Resistance, movement speed and attack speed. You are taking damage over time.

name: Malice
display_help: The Malice Monument has increased your Accuracy, but reduced your Defense.

name: Immobilize
display_help: Monuments cannot move

name: Panic

name: Sinew

name: Merge

name: Explosive_Blast
display_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

name: Nova
display_help: You can explode in a tremendous blast of energy, sending nearby foes flying. The Nova deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover any Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
